item.title: Man ‘commits suicide’ at Mohammadpur
item.description: A man allegedly took his own life at his residence in Mohammadpur area of Dhaka on Sunday. The deceased was identified as Swapan Mia, 25, son of Bazlu Mia of Lalmohon upazila of Bhola district and he used to live with his wife in a rented house at Chandrima Model Town Road of Mohammadpur. His wif

item.title: Chinese 'K Visa' can be a milestone for Bangladeshi students
item.description: China has launched a new visa policy named 'K Visa', which is exclusively designed for graduates in specific fields. The fields prioritise the talent souls to contribute to their country, especially in the arenas of technology and innovation. Initially K visa inspires the students who have graduat

item.title: NCP accuses EC of arbitrary decision over denial of ‘Water Lily’
item.description:
National Citizen Party-NCP on Sunday alleged that the Election Commission (EC) is making an 'arbitrary decision' by denying the party its desired electoral symbol 'Water Lily'.
"We've seen that the Election Commission is taking an arbitrary decision," said NCP chief organiser for the south

item.title: Bangladesh announces 3-day waiver of fees for non-scheduled flights after Dhaka airport fire
item.description: All fees for non-scheduled flights at Dhaka’s Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport have been waived for the next three days following a major fire at the airport’s cargo complex. Sheikh Bashir Uddin, advisor to the Ministry of Civil Aviation and Tourism, announced on Sunday while spe

item.title: Morocco: The tales of deserts, mountains and the sea
item.description:
I fell in love with you watching Casablanca Back row of the drive-in show in the flickering light Popcorn and cokes beneath the stars Became champagne and caviar Making love on a long hot summer's night
I am from the generation who grew up listening to the song Casablanca by Bertie Hig

item.title: Gano Forum signs July Charter
item.description: Gano Forum has signed the July Charter, joining the list of political parties endorsing the political accord initiated by the National Consensus Commission. Gano Forum’s acting president and valiant freedom fighter Subrata Chowdhury and general secretary Dr Md Mizanur Rahman signed the chart
